cobol_file.content:
IDENTIFICATION DIVISION.
       PROGRAM-ID. AOC-2021-07-2.
       AUTHOR. ANNA KOSIERADZKA.

       ENVIRONMENT DIVISION.
       INPUT-OUTPUT SECTION.
       FILE-CONTROL.
           SELECT INPUTFILE ASSIGN TO "d07.input"
           ORGANIZATION IS LINE SEQUENTIAL.

       DATA DIVISION.

       FILE SECTION.
         FD INPUTFILE.
         01 INPUTRECORD PIC X(4).
      * input was modified to have 1 number per line   
         
       WORKING-STORAGE SECTION.
         01 FILE-STATUS PIC 9 VALUE 0.
         01 N PIC 9(4) VALUE 1000.
         01 WS-ARRAY OCCURS 0 TO 1000 TIMES DEPENDING ON N.
           05 WS-NUM PIC 9(4) VALUE 0.
         01 WS-MEAN PIC 9(16) VALUE 0.
         01 WS-SUM PIC 9(16) VALUE 0.
         01 WS-ANS1 PIC 9(16) VALUE 0.
         01 WS-ANS2 PIC 9(16) VALUE 0.
         01 WS-ANS3 PIC 9(16) VALUE 0.
         01 WS-RESULT PIC 9(16) VALUE 0.
         77 X PIC 9(16) VALUE 0.

       LOCAL-STORAGE SECTION.
         01 I UNSIGNED-INT VALUE 1.

       PROCEDURE DIVISION.
       001-MAIN.
            OPEN INPUT INPUTFILE.
            PERFORM 002-READ UNTIL FILE-STATUS = 1.
            CLOSE INPUTFILE.
            PERFORM 004-COMPUTE.
            DISPLAY WS-RESULT.
            STOP RUN.
            
       002-READ.
            READ INPUTFILE
                AT END MOVE 1 TO FILE-STATUS
                NOT AT END PERFORM 003-PROCESS-RECORD
            END-READ.

       003-PROCESS-RECORD.
           COMPUTE WS-NUM(I) = FUNCTION NUMVAL(INPUTRECORD).
           ADD 1 TO I.

       004-COMPUTE.
           PERFORM VARYING I FROM 1 BY 1 UNTIL I > N
             COMPUTE WS-SUM = WS-SUM + WS-NUM(I)
           END-PERFORM.
           COMPUTE WS-MEAN ROUNDED = WS-SUM / N.

           PERFORM VARYING I FROM 1 BY 1 UNTIL I > N
             COMPUTE X = FUNCTION ABS(WS-MEAN - 1 - WS-NUM(I))
             COMPUTE WS-ANS1 = WS-ANS1 + (X * (X + 1))/ 2
             COMPUTE X = FUNCTION ABS(WS-MEAN - WS-NUM(I))
             COMPUTE WS-ANS2 = WS-ANS2 + (X * (X + 1))/ 2
             COMPUTE X = FUNCTION ABS(WS-MEAN + 1 - WS-NUM(I))
             COMPUTE WS-ANS3 = WS-ANS3 + (X * (X + 1))/ 2
           END-PERFORM.
           COMPUTE WS-RESULT = FUNCTION MIN(WS-ANS1, WS-ANS2, WS-ANS3).
